bibl.title: Poetae comici Graeci (PCG). Vol. II. Agathenor - Aristonymus.
bibl.seg: KASSEL Rudolf et Colin AUSTIN, Poetae comici Graeci (PCG). Vol. II. Agathenor - Aristonymus.
Berlin - New York, W. de Gruyter, 1991, 8°, xxxiv-581 pp. ISBN 3-11-012840-3. DM 348.

C.R. par G. Defossé, EtCl 60 (1992) p. 282. - Thomas Gelzer, MusHelv 49 (1992) p. 59. - Richard Hunter, CR N.S., 43 (1993) pp. 17-19. - Alain Blanchard, REG 107 (1994) pp. 293-294. - Herman Van Looy, AntCl 62 (1993) p. 278. - Bernhard Zimmermann, Gymnasium 100 (1993) pp. 454-455. - Hans-Joachim Newiger, Gnomon 73 (2001) pp. 97-102.
